#summary Monitoring extras (Hyperic HQ plugin, etc) for Apache CXF.

= CXF Monitoring =

[http://cxf.apache.org/ CXF] already has all the JMX MBeans needed to [http://cxf.apache.org/docs/jmx-management.html monitor web services]. Here is a Hyperic HQ plugin to integrate these web service in your monitoring system.

== JSP / VisualVM / Hyperic HQ rendering ==

 * JSP monitoring page : [http://xebia-france.googlecode.com/svn/management/xebia-management-extras/trunk/src/main/webapp/jmx/cxf.jsp ehcache.jsp (source)],

 * Hyperic plugin: [http://xebia-france.googlecode.com/svn/management/xebia-management-extras/trunk/src/main/hyperic/tomcat-extras-cxf-plugin.xml tomcat-extras-cxf-plugin.xml], see XebiaManagementExtrasHypericPlugins.
